about_the_game:
Game features:

Creating a terrifying atmosphere:
The game creates a tense and thrilling atmosphere of horror through exquisite scene design, realistic sound effects, and lighting effects. The abandoned medical school building, gloomy corridors, bloodstained laboratories... every place is filled with danger and unknowns.



Diversified enemy design:
The enemies in the game include various terrifying creatures, ghosts, and mutants. They have different attack methods and abilities, and players need to use wisdom and courage to face their challenges.



Action shooting mechanism:
The game adopts a smooth action shooting mechanism, and players can use various weapons and props to eliminate enemies. At the same time, the game also incorporates action elements such as dodge, dodge, and counterattack, making the battle more exciting and tense.

Simulation and daily life:
The player will play the role of a brave gatekeeper guarding the abandoned medical school, not only facing various threats from terrifying creatures, but also protecting their little black cat and uncovering the terrifying secrets behind the medical school.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains terrifying monsters, ghosts, and demons.

name: where is my cat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750 2GB or AMD HD7770 2GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: "Where is My Cat" is a horror shooter game where you play as a janitor in an abandoned medical school and spend your days looking for your missing cat.
